title: Diploma in Stress Management
headline: Gain a better understanding of the effects of stress and learn useful strategies and techniques for coping with it.
description: This free online Stress Management course will teach you the principles associated with the assessment and reduction of stress. You will study the different types of stress, sources of stress, and personality factors associated with stress. You will also look into psychiatric disorders such as OCD and depression which are associated with it. More importantly, you will learn about ways to reduce and deal with stress.
courseDescription:
This course begins by giving you an introduction to stress. You will look into its history and study the role of personality factors in stress. Stress can have an impact on the nervous system. With this course, you will learn how the brain functions and how the brain responds during a stressful situation. You will also gain knowledge of how the endocrine system is affected when you experience stress as well as study the effects of adrenal fatigue.

You will then learn how to assess stress levels and improve your self-esteem. Your thoughts, beliefs, and emotions work together when you are experiencing stress. With this course, you will learn how relaxation can help to reduce stress through different coping strategies and how imagery can be used to reduce stress. It will also teach you the difference between stress and anxiety. You will also study the link between exercise and stress including different exercises that can lift your spirits.

Learn how to successfully deal with personal stress by studying this free online course from Alison. Stress can affect many people in different ways and some people return to their resting rate sooner than others after a stressful situation. Upon the completion of this course, you will learn that there are different types of stressors and stress can even be helpful to an individual. Start improving your stress management abilities today with this free online course.
